Roberto Martinez is the leading candidate to replace Rafael Benitez as Everton manager, sources have told ESPN.
The Belgium coach has received strong backing from the Goodison Park hierarchy followi… [+1551 chars]

articles.author: Adam Brown
articles.title: Fabinho 9/10 as his goal-scoring form continues against Brentford - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Fabinho was commanding in midfield, and on the score sheet once more, as Liverpool eased to victory at home to Brentford.
articles.content:
It was back to winning ways in the Premier League for Liverpool on Sunday afternoon as they ran out 3-0 winners against Brentford at Anfield.
